client.label: Scope
client.hint: Choose the magnitude of your project

medium.label: Regional
medium.hint: Brands suited for a broader, colorful, and cultural diverse audience.

large.label: Worldwide
large.hint: International audience. Brands with respect for the diversity of cultures, styles, languages, design traditions. Sky is the limit.

nameExists.label: Existing Name
nameExists.hint: I already have a brand name.

nonprofit.label: Non-Profit
nonprofit.hint: Discount for non-profit organizations, open-source projects, NGOs.

items.label: Brand Name Research
items.details: We research possible brand names based on your profession, project or product.
items.hint: We come up with a collection of suitable brand names for you.

items.label: Branding Workshop
items.details: Full day workshop where we define core brand values and research brand names together.
items.hint: Workshop to develop core brand values and ultimately, your brand name.

items.label: Register Domain
items.details: Research and register (free) domain names (.com, .ch, etc.).

items.label: Tagline
items.details: We come up with the perfect tagline/slogan for your brand.

items.label: Logo/Trademark
items.details: A great logo is priceless. The trademark is the single most important piece and the core of your brand communications. We develop simple, universally comprehensible and unique logo designs that perfectly represent your company and values.
items.hint: We develop simple, universally comprehensible and unique logo designs that perfectly represent your company and values.

items.label: Brand Assets
items.details: We create design assets for your brand: Backgrounds, illustrations, image enhancements, business cards, etc.
items.hint: E.g. Illustrations, backgrounds, business cards, etc.

items.label: Style Guide
items.details: Style guidance for your brand identity: Typography, colors, spacing, etc.

items.label: Style Guide: Web, UI
items.details: Additional style guide for web and user interface design. Buttons, spacing, gradients, interactivity, etc.
items.hint: Additional style guide for digital user interfaces.
